description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Network superintendents supervise school principals and try to help them get resources they need to successfully run their school. There is one network superintendent for all 11 Oakland middle schools.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
